item.title: You Don’t Have an ESG Reporting Problem — You Have a Performance Problem
item.description:
English ｜ 中文摘要 ｜ 中文首頁

Opening

Many companies believe their ESG ratings are stuck because their reports are not good enough.

The narrative sounds familiar: “We need clearer disclosures.”
“We need better alignment with frameworks.”
“We need a more compelling ESG story.”

But after years of working inside ESG initiatives, I have learned something uncomfortable:

Most organizations do not have an ESG reporting problem.
They have a performance problem.

Why better reports don’t lead to better ESG ratings

ESG ratings are often misunderstood.
